CHAT_001.MESSAGE_CONTENT: Hi, I'm having trouble with my billing account. Can you help me?
Hello! I'd be happy to help you with your billing issue. Can you tell me more about the specific problem you're experiencing?
I was charged twice for the same service last month. I need a refund for the duplicate charge.
I understand your concern about the duplicate charge. Let me check your account right away. I can see the duplicate charge for $29.99. I'll process a refund for you immediately.
Thank you so much! That's exactly what I needed. You've been very helpful.

CHAT_002.MESSAGE_CONTENT: Your service is terrible! I've been waiting for hours and no one has responded!
I sincerely apologize for the delay. I'm here to help you now. What specific issue can I assist you with?
I ordered a product 2 weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. This is unacceptable!
I'll check your order status immediately. Can you provide your order number?
Order #12345. I expect better service than this.
I see your order was delayed due to shipping issues. I'm expediting a replacement order with overnight shipping at no charge. You'll receive it tomorrow.
Ok, that sounds reasonable. Thanks for fixing this.

CHAT_003.MESSAGE_CONTENT: How do I reset my password?
I can help you reset your password. Please visit our website and click 'Forgot Password' or I can send you a reset link to your email.
